alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 04 at 1:20AM PDT until November 04 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches above 4000 feet MSL. Winds gusts as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...Baker County including Baker City and the Baker Valley. * WHEN...Through Noon today. Snow will change to rain below 6000 feet MSL this afternoon. Blowing snow will restrict visibility at times. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
